member.name: T:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl
member.summary: A Control to add login ability for the content management system. Default user is: DTIAdmin Default Password is: DTIPass User is prompted for a new user/pw after the first login.

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.LoginMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the different loging modes for editing text, changing layout, and logging out of the admin panel

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.isLoggedIn
member.summary: Gets or sets the login state

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.MaxLoginAttempts
member.summary: Number of consective login failures before account is locked

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.LoginFailureWaitTime
member.summary: Number of minutes to wait before being able to log back in after account it locked

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.DisableDefaultStyle
member.summary: Remove defualt style of login control

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.isSiteEditLogin
member.summary: If true all DTIControls items (editpanel, adminpanel, sortable) will be activated for site editing

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.AutoRedirect
member.summary: If set to true user will automatacally be redirected back to the current page after successfull login

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.LoginAndEditOn
member.summary: If set to true the site will be placed into Edit Mode on successfull login

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.EnablePasswordStrength
member.summary: Determines if the Password Strength Text is shown on creating initial login

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.ForgotPasswordText
member.summary: Text show for the forgot password link.
member.remarks: Must set ForgotPasswordLink

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.ForgotPasswordURL
member.summary: Url for the forgot password page

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.EnableRememberMe
member.summary: Enables remember me checkbox for loging in with cookies

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.RememberMeText
member.summary: Text to display for the Remember me checkbox

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.RememberMeTimeout
member.summary: Number of days past current time to set cookie expiration date

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.AccountLockedMessage
member.summary: Error message to display when a account has been locked due to failed logins

member.name: P:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.LoginFailedMessage
member.summary: Error message to display on unsuccessful login

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.CreateMD5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a MD5 hash of a given string

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.isHashedValue(System.Data.DataTable@,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: returns id of User if username and hashed password is in table. Also hashes any passwords not generated by this method and replaces password.

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.PasswordHashAndCheck(DTIAdminPanel.dsDTIAdminPanel.DTIUsersRow@,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if Users Password is correct and hashed. If password is not hashed this function will hash the password
member.param: Iterations to make if password is not hashed
member.returns: Currentuser if login successfull, Nothing if login fails

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.PasswordHashAndCheck(System.Data.DataTable@,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: returns id of User if username and hashed password is in table. Also hashes any passwords not generated by this method and replaces password.
member.remarks: Requires dtusers to contain user trying to login

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.createUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds user to the DTIUsersDataTable. Takes care of hashing their password

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.loginUser(System.String,System.String,System.Int64,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Processes user's login request. Return row of user if successful or nothing if not successfull. Throws exception if user is required to change thier password, if their account is locked due to exceeding the max login attempts, or if user doesn't exist.

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.SetUserCookie(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add encrypted LoginControl cookie for automatic logins
member.param: Number of days until cookie expires
Key used to encrypt cookie data

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.GetUserCookie(System.String@,System.String@,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Key used to decrypt cookie data
member.remarks: DecryptionKey must be the same as the EncryptionKey used in SetUserCookie

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.RemoveCookie(System.String)
member.summary: Marks cookie as expired so the browser will delete it.
member.remarks: You cannot directly delete a cookie on a user's computer. However, you can direct the user's browser to delete the cookie by setting the cookie's expiration date to a past date. http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms178195.aspx

member.name: M:DTIAdminPanel.LoginControl.CookieLogin(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Attempts Loing using stored cookie (if it exists)
